pullRequest.title: `PodTemplateUtils#combine` shouldn't have a side-effect on the parent pod template

commit.message: PodTemplateUtils#combine shouldn't have a side-effect on the parent pod template

nodes.bodyText: Is this test reproducing the bug? I thought that the problem was that the parent template would grow endlessly, so we should have a test asserting that after combination the parent template does not contain some property.
